name.baseName: Waste water ; Waste water ; Fugitive wastewater collection, treatment and disposal process ; Non-open and non-closed wastewater treatment facilities such as biochemical treatment units; NESPS2
废水 ; 废水 ; 废水收集、处理和处置过程逸散 ; 生化处理装置等非敞口非密闭废水处理设施 ; 全国第二次污染普查数据

dataSetInformation.common:generalComment: the treatment technology for the pollution of Wastewaterdidn't offered，The formula for calculating the actual operation rate (k-value) of the end-of-pipe treatment facility is /

technology.technologyDescriptionAndIncludedProcesse: the treatment technology for the pollution of Wastewaterdidn't offered，The formula for calculating the actual operation rate (k-value) of the end-of-pipe treatment facility is /
technology.technologicalApplicability: 所描述的流程旨在收集、处理和处置逸散废水。它被用于非敞口和非密闭废水处理设施，例如生化处理单元。此系统旨在处理各种行业中可能出现的难以控制的废水，确保在处置之前进行适当的处理。尽管未提供挥发性有机化合物（VOCs）的处理技术，但在VOCs引起关注的情况下，此类流程至关重要。

referenceToDataSource.common:shortDescription: 第二次全国污染源普查产排污核算系数手册（试用版）,二级代码07文件，在完整版文件中第75页

dataSourcesTreatmentAndRepresentativenes.useAdviceForDataSet: This dataset is derived from the Pollution Source Census Report and contains information on pollution emissions and related products. However, it does not include data on energy or chemical consumption, nor does it provide information on waste or co-product generation. When utilizing this dataset, please supplement the missing data based on actual conditions before use
该数据集来源于污染源普查报告，包含污染物排放及相关产品信息，但不包含能源或化学品消耗数据，也不提供废弃物或共生产物产生信息。在使用该数据集时，请根据实际情况补充缺失数据后再使用。

review.common:reviewDetails: Inventory: The internal review was done by several iteration steps concerning raw data validation, raw data documentation, representativity, completeness and consistency of modelling with regard to ISO 14040 and 14044.
清单： 内部审查通过几个迭代步骤完成，涉及原始数据验证、原始数据记录、代表性、完整性、与 ISO 14040 和 14044 有关的建模的一致性。

common:referenceToPersonOrEntityGenerati.common:shortDescription: The data was created by the Office of the Second National Pollution Source Census of the Ministry of Ecology and Environment, and the data was organized by the TianGong Plan team for ILCD format
生态环境部第二次全国污染源普查工作办公室创建数据，天工计划团队常慧敏整理数据为ILCD格式

publicationAndOwnership.common:licenseType: Free of charge for all users and uses

exchange.generalComment: the treatment technology for the pollution of volatile organic compounddidn't offered，The formula for calculating the actual operation rate (k-value) of the end-of-pipe treatment facility is k = power consumption of treatment facilities (kWh/year) / (equipment rated power (kW) × equipment operating time (hours/year))
污染物指标挥发性有机物的末端治理技术未说明。原文件中描述污染物类别为废气，污染物指标为挥发性有机物，此处对其进行了匹配工作，将其匹配到LCAflow库里面相最符合的流
源文件中描述为为废水，此处对其进行了匹配工作，将其匹配到LCAflow库里面相最符合的流
